Flow Markers - Surface
```{r}
data.frame(fluorophore = c("Alexa 488", "PE", "PE Cy5", "PE Cy7", "APC", 
                           "Alexa 700", "Alexa 405", "AmCyan"), 
           markers = c("CD172", "CD45RA", "CD4", "CCR7", "SLADQ",
                       "CD3", "CD8", "Live/dead"))
```

AmyCyan = live/dead
PE Cy7 = CCR7
APC = SLADQ
Alexa 700 = CD3
PE Cy5 = CD4
Alexa 405 = CD8
Alexa 488 = CD127 - IL-7  receptor
PE = CD45RA
